items.sentence: I'll always remember the first time that I saw Tom.
I'm sorry that you didn't get a chance to meet Tom.
I'm glad you were able to go to Australia with Tom.
Tom thinks Mary doesn't know John can speak French.
Tom says he'll study French with Mary this evening.
Tom said he thought it might happen in Boston, too.
Doesn't anyone have anything nice to say about Tom?
I think you do need to hire someone other than Tom.
Tom told everybody that Mary couldn't speak French.
Tom may be staying with his grandparents in Boston.
